title: Rakan & Xayah Icon (play 2 games) not received
body: I played two games with me playing Xayah and my friend playing Rakan (Normal draft) on EUW. Within the deadline / period. Didn't receive the icon yet (the 2 feathers icon). I did receive the icon for gifting though.

replies.body: That's weird, we'd be happy to look into this for you.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your games and check for eligibility, and gran the icon if so.  We'll see you there!
